text: In the beginning, there was HTML, or HyperText Markup Language - a type of language that provides structure to plain text documents.
This structure allowed web browsers to display them in an organized way, forming the backbone of the world wide web.
In other words, the modern internet was born ..with.. structure.
Google learned to index this structure. It crawled, ranked, and made the web searchable.
And then came ChatGPT â€” trained on this web of documents, conversations, and code.
